resources.string: [sl]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[sl]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[sl]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[sl]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.

[sl]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.
[sl]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[sl]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[sl]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[sl]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[sl]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[sl]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[sl]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[sl]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[sl]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[sl]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor & improve your proposition.
[sl]The Security & Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[sl]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[sl]The CDP2 platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.
[sl]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics

Philipsu dovoljujem, da zbira moje podatke v aplikaciji in jih uporablja za zagotavljanje delovanja aplikacije, izboljševanje aplikacije, prilagajanje aplikacije, integracijo z družabnimi omrežji ter prikazovanje ustrezne vsebine in oglasov.

Obvestilo o piškotkih

Ta aplikacija uporablja Adobe Analytics, storitev za analiziranje ("Adobe Analytics"), ki jo zagotavlja družba Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited ("Adobe"). Storitev Adobe Analytics uporablja "piškotke" ali podobna sredstva, s katerimi lahko aplikacija analizira vzorce skupnega prometa v aplikaciji. Informacije, ki jih piškotek ustvari o uporabi aplikacije, se posredujejo družbi Adobe, da se naslov IP pred geografsko lokalizacijo zakrije in zamenja s splošnim naslovom IP pred shranjevanjem. Družba Adobe v Philipsovem imenu te informacije uporablja, da lahko ocenjuje vašo uporabo aplikacije, za Philips ustvarja poročila o dejavnosti v aplikaciji in Philipsu zagotavlja druge storitve, povezane z dejavnostjo v aplikaciji in uporabo aplikacije. Družba Adobe vašega naslova IP ne bo povezala z drugimi podatki, ki jih hrani. Družbi Adobe in Philipsu lahko preprečite shranjevanje in uporabo podatkov (piškotkov in naslova IP), če to možnost zavrnete, ko zaprete ta zaslon.
[sl]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

Ker ste oddali soglasje, vam lahko podjetja iz skupine Philips pošiljajo promocijska obvestila prek e-pošte, sporočil SMS in drugih digitalnih kanalov, kot so mobilne aplikacije in družbena omrežja. Da bomo obvestila lahko prilagodili vašim izbiram in vedenju ter vam nudili najboljše in čim bolj osebno prilagojeno doživetje, lahko analiziramo in združujemo vaše osebne podatke. Ti podatki lahko vključujejo: 

Podatke, ki nam jih posredujete
Podatke, ki jih aktivno delite z nami, kot so: ime, datum rojstva ali starost, e-poštni naslov, hišni naslov, država, spol, telefonska številka, profil v družabnem omrežju.

Podatke, ki jih pridobimo prek komunikacije z družbo Philips
Podatki o vaši komunikaciji in uporabi Philipsovih digitalnih kanalov, kot so družbena omrežja, spletne strani, e-pošta, aplikacije in povezani izdelki. Ti podatki lahko vključujejo: naslov IP, piškotke, informacije o napravi, uporabljene povezave, podrobnosti o lokaciji in obiskane spletne strani.

Philips vam omogoča možnost, da soglasje kadarkoli prekličete.
Za več informacij preberite Philipsovo obvestilo o zasebnosti in Philipsovo obvestilo o piškotkih.
[sl]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[sl]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[sl]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[sl]Configuration can only be changed at launch time. You need to relaunch the app to change it.
[sl]I want to share my app data to help improve the app and provide me with personalized services

[sl]Adobe Analytics\\n\\nThis App uses Adobe Analytics, an analytics service (\\\"Adobe Analytics”) provided by Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (\\\"Adobe\\\") Adobe Analytics uses \\\"cookies\\\" or similar techniques, which are text files placed in your App, in order to help the App to analyze overall traffic patterns through our App. By transmitting the information generated by the cookie about the use of the App to Adobe, setting ensures that IP address is anonymized before geo-localization und will be replaced by a generic IP address before storage. On behalf of Philips, Adobe will use this information for the evaluation of your use of the App, compiling reports on App activity for Philips, and in order to provide other services relating to App activity and use of the App to IP address with any other data held Philips Adobe will not associate your by Adobe. You can prevent Adobe\\\'s and Philips collection and use of data out after you close this screen (cookies and IP address) if you opt-out after you close this screen.\\n\\nGoogle Firebase\\n\\nThis App uses Google Firebase, an app development service (Firebase) provided by Google Ireland Ltd (\\\"Google\\\"). Firebase uses cookies or similar techniques- SDK, which are text files placed in your App and web browser.\\n\\nOn behalf of Philips, Firebase will use information from your device such as your Device ID. IP address, your IDFA or Google Play Services ID and your MAC address and replace them with unique code. When you use the App we will measure the numbers of visits to the App, which pages you visit your network connection, load times and when the app crashes. We use this information to evaluate and understand your use of the App, to test and analyze performance and ultimately optimize our products and services.
